@mempko @vbuterin Yeah really!
I agree with both points, I mean the crypto landscape is a wild west, interesting tech, but you gotta be so careful. Vitalik is one of the trust-points 4 sure, really an important figure!

For public ledgers like Ethereum, shifting to PoS is really great, as it can be done reliably (as proven by The Merge). Seeing massive amounts of (emissions heavy) energy being essentially wasted for centralized ASIC governance by big miners saddens me a bit...
